mapper.html:
Dear {{1.`5`}},

Thank you for placing your order!

It is being prepared and will be with you in approximately 2 weeks.

In case of any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

Kind Regards,
Your Company
mapper.subject: Thanks for your order - {{1.`1`}}

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.subject: Order {{1.`1`}} - Backorder Notification
mapper.html:
Dear {{1.`5`}},

Your order {{1.`1`}} for {{1.`4`}} units of {{1.`3`}} is on backorder as we out out of stock or have limited availability.

Your order will be ready for shipment in approximately 4 weeks.

If you have any questions please get in touch with our customer support team.

Thank you,
Your Company
